app.name: Discord DKP BOT
login.message: To access all functionalities you need to login first
dashboard.noServers: No servers available, please invite bot to your server
dashboard.updatePremium: To obtain functionality please contact application administrator via discord: ainu_
admin.settings.adminRoleHelper: This role will grant an access for user to all admin functionalities of this application
admin.settings.moderatorRoleHelper: This role will grant an access for user to all moderator functionalities of this application
admin.settings.memberRoleHelper: This role will allow user to view application data
admin.settings.daysToObtainLootHelper: This number is an amount of days member needs to be in guild to pretend for loot
error.dataCorrupted: Data corrupted, refresh page and try again
error.invalidFieldsData: Fields data incorrect, check if all fields is correct
error.fieldsMustBeDifferent: Roles must be different for each functionality
error.genericError: Something went wrong, restart application and try again
admin.encounters.title: Encounters
admin.encounters.emptyEncounters: There are no encounters yet, create your first one
admin.encounters.addNewEncounterDescript: This data will be used in future to create guild scheduled or manual events, this is not actual event but template for generating events in future
admin.encounters.encounterNameHelper: This name will be displayed everywhere where this encounter will be used
admin.encounters.scheduledEncounterHelpe: Will be generated automatically for specified week days and time
admin.encounters.primeEncounterHelper: Will be used for attendance calculation
admin.encounters.encounterWeightHelper: This value will be used in attendance calculation formula where weight applies coefficient for the boss where 0 is not counted boss, 1 is x1, 2 is x2 and etc, works only for prime bosses
admin.encounters.everyDayHelper: This will generate events every day at same time
admin.encounters.table.name: Name
admin.encounters.deleteModalTitle: Are you sure you want to delete Encounter?
admin.encounters.deleteModalText: This action will delete encounter and all events related to it, maybe better to edit existing, if you want to change something
admin.encounters.deleteModalProceed: I know what i am doing
events.title: 's Events
events.addEventDescription: Here you can add a custom event which is created at Encounters, to events list
events.deleteEventTitle: Are you sure you want to delete Event?
events.deleteEventText: This action will delete event and all data related to this event including uploaded screenshots, think twice before proceed.
events.deleteEventProceed: I am confident with my actions and willing to proceed
